name: Don't get Rick Roll'd (Rick Astley, changes cursor
description: When you hover over a link leading to the two most popular RickRoll videos on YouTube, your cursor will change into a photo of Rick Astley. You can easily change the CSS to serve as another kind of personal warning for yourself.
additional_info:
Update 2016-02-08: This cursor still works fine, but is now redundant with the update to my Dynamic Cursor userstyle: https://userstyles.org/styles/123195/dynamic-cursor

Update 2016-01-17: Updated to include link coming from Facebook.

http://derrickrossignol.com
